summary: Provides extensive unit and integration tests for the conditional 2‑D UNet model used in diffusion pipelines, verifying its behavior across various pretrained checkpoints, precision modes, attention slicing options, custom attention processors, LoRA adapters, IP‑Adapter embeddings, checkpoint sharding, serialization, and hardware‑specific configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, configurability, and performance of the conditional UNet component in diffusion workflows, enabling reliable model development, deployment, and scaling across diverse hardware environments.
